mil3.5.10:1.4: “Sakka pana, bhante nagasena, buddho nidassetum idha va idha va”ti?
mil3.5.10:1.5: “Parinibbuto, maharaja, bhagava anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya, na sakka bhagava nidassetum ‘idha va idha va’”ti.
mil3.5.10:2.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, mahato aggikkhandhassa jalamanassa ya acci atthangata, sakka sa acci dassetum ‘idha va idha va’”ti?
mil3.5.10:2.3: “Na hi, bhante, niruddha sa acci appannattim gata”ti.
mil3.5.10:2.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, bhagava anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbuto atthangato, na sakka bhagava nidassetum ‘idha va idha va’ti, dhammakayena pana kho, maharaja, sakka bhagava nidassetum.
